com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

Interface AppPublics.BroadcastListenerProvider

  • Enclosing class:
    AppPublics

    public static interface AppPublics.BroadcastListenerProvider
    States that the Android Activity or Fragment entity which implements this interface is able to provide a single AppPublics.BroadcastListener.

    As soon as a Smartable entity implements this interface, it is able to register a wrapped BroadcastReceiver instance through the concept of AppPublics.BroadcastListener: this is handy, because it enables to integrate an independent reusable AppPublics.BroadcastListener at the same time, and because the framework takes care of unregistering it when the embedding entity is destroyed.

    Since:
    2010.02.04
    See Also:
    Smarted#registerBroadcastListeners(BroadcastListener[]), AppPublics.BroadcastListener, AppPublics.BroadcastListenersProviders

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AppPublics.BroadcastListener getBroadcastListener()
      This method will be invoked by the framework for registering a AppPublics.BroadcastListener.

    • Method Detail

      • getBroadcastListener

        AppPublics.BroadcastListener getBroadcastListener()
        This method will be invoked by the framework for registering a AppPublics.BroadcastListener.
        Returns:
        the broadcast listener that this provider exposes ; can be null, and in that case, no AppPublics.BroadcastListener will be registered
